synopsis.text: Dynasty of Dali, a realm of billions, lies under the Ascension Sect's rule, where yearly tributes of treasures and talents are paid. The Ascension Sect's Taoist teachings and refined magical weapons serve as the gateway to a fantastical world. In this multiverse of historical allusions, a humble family slave, Fang Han, nurtures a deep-rooted belief - 'I would rather be a beggar than a slave.' With unwavering determination, he embarks on a solitary journey, unraveling the enigma of supernatural powers and transforming his mortal body into an immortal one. Through relentless effort, he ascends into the realm of fairyland, ultimately becoming the supreme king.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
